Audio.Comments: A complete song. I lost a lot of blood while making this recording... [Link to photo of the same bird in this recording](http://antpitta.com/images/photos/wrens/Scaly-breasted-Wren-almejal_9331.jpg)bird-seen:yesplayback-used:yes
